title: We develop advanced software for the financial sector.
intro:
Storm Software Plc, "Storm", is a developer of advanced software for the financial sector and its related partners. The development of such software focuses on monitoring commercial transactions through Playback? and real time movement and tracking of commercial documents by Ola?.

Storm also creates and develops software for algorithmic derivative and equity trading funds, alongside a managed control and monitoring service. Allied to software development, Storm provides an employment and placement service for IT sector professionals in all categories of the industry.
